author: George Bull
title: How I'd tear up the tax system and make a better one
text: Tax How I'd tear up the tax system and make a better one Have your say: George Bull would scrap National Insurance, most tax reliefs and the automatic fines for late returns. What would you do? The complicated rules that tie up the tax system should be swept away Photo: Â© Pete Gardner By George Bull
